title: Solia's Moon
description: When her terraforming company expands beyond making places habitable, to creating humanoid life, Lunar Physician Solia Calian has to find a way to stop them. She’ll have the help of a mysterious sheriff named Giancarlo Sable, but they’d better hurry up. When the ones they hope to liberate start turning on them, figuring out where the real danger lies is the only way to escape alive.
author: Lyn Brittan
